class TreeEdge[source]

TreeEdge(value:Value, child:TreeNode)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Examples

{% raw %} 
val = Value('name1', 5)
TN = TreeNode('attribute1', 'stats1')
TE = TreeEdge(val, TN) #krawedz z wag 5 prowadzi do wezla TN
{% endraw %}
